Its a very good game im having fun when im playing it, but it needs some updates and fixes.

Pros
-Community is very diverse and you can get a couple of laughs out of it
-Animations are sharp and precise
-Gunplay is very diverse
-Easy to learn, hard to master
Cons
-Game's super competitive and relies too much around quick reaction times and pixel-peeking
-Can only get 30 FPS on a low-end device.
